about:
Hello! My name is Shourya and I'm a 3rd yr. CS Engineering student. My interest in web and app development started from my pre-college days when I tried forking an android app to get rid of apps. Turns out hacking together a custom application taught me a lot about how apps work!

Fast-forward to today, and I've had the privilege of working at a start-up, and a student-led developer club. My main focus these days is learning new technologies and leveling up as a developer.

I also happen to be a regular contributor to open-source projects like CircuitVerse and Flutter.

Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, NextJS, FastAPI & Flutter.
bio: I'm a Full Stack Developer and an Open Source Enthusiast

experience.title: SDE Intern
experience.description: Working on a web platform to help people connect digitally and help them forget the pain of carrying physical business cards again.

experience.title: Web & App Lead
experience.description: Managing team of student developers and organised events for the club. Also worked on the club website and database.
